name: Ember Copilot
headline: The only medical scribe that reduces claim denials by 55%
description: At Ember, we're tackling one of healthcare's most costly and overlooked challenges: the massive inefficiency in clinical documentation and revenue cycle management. Medical practices lose billions annually due to incomplete documentation, missed billing opportunities, and denied claims - issues that stem from antiquated systems that force clinicians to choose between patient care and paperwork. We combine ambient listening technology with deep understanding of medical billing requirements to eliminate the administrative burden that plagues healthcare providers.

founders.name: Charlene Wang, Founder
founders.description: Charlene is the CEO and co-founder of Ember Copilot. Previously a product manager on Healthcare AI at Google, she collaborated with Elevance Health to develop remote patient monitoring solutions. Charlene led the launch of sleep-sensing technology on Google Nest’s smart displays, improving the sleep quality of millions of users. Her research has been featured in Radiology and NEJM Catalyst. She holds a degree in Applied Mathematics, Computer Science, and Economics from Brown University.

founders.name: Warren Wang, Founder
founders.description: Warren is the co-founder of Ember Copilot. In the past, he did explainable AI research at MIT CSAIL and medical AI research with NVIDIA at hospitals in Taiwan. Warren holds a BS in EECS/Physics and MEng in EECS from MIT. He was a gold medalist at the 50th International Physics Olympiad.

# Automate Workflows for More Efficient Patient Care
Reduce administrative burden, enhance patient interactions, and optimize reimbursement processes.
[![tab-icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66eeff4baa6a1f66f357144c/66eeff4caa6a1f66f35714c3_circle-arrow-reload-01.svg)**Real-Time Documentation Support** Flag missing documentation while the patient is still in the room to ensure complete and accurate records.![chevron-icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66eeff4baa6a1f66f357144c/66eeff4caa6a1f66f35714c6_Chevron-right-black.svg)](https://www.embercopilot.ai/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[![tab-icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66eeff4baa6a1f66f357144c/66eeff4caa6a1f66f35714c2_credit-card-pos.svg)Seamless EHR IntegrationEffortlessly sync with your existing EHR system for a more efficient clinical workflow.![chevron-icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66eeff4baa6a1f66f357144c/66eeff4caa6a1f66f35714c6_Chevron-right-black.svg)](https://www.embercopilot.ai/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[![tab-icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66eeff4baa6a1f66f357144c/66eeff4caa6a1f66f35714cc_analytics-up.svg)**Accurate Medical Coding for Faster Reimbursements** Optimized diagnosis and procedure codes with 98% accuracy, minimizing denials and speeding up reimbursements.![chevron-icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66eeff4baa6a1f66f357144c/66eeff4caa6a1f66f35714c6_Chevron-right-black.svg)](https://www.embercopilot.ai/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)[![tab-icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66eeff4baa6a1f66f357144c/66eeff4caa6a1f66f35714c4_database-sync.svg)**Revenue Cycle Optimization** Improve financial performance with smarter, automated revenue cycle management (RCM) solutions.![chevron-icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66eeff4baa6a1f66f357144c/66eeff4caa6a1f66f35714c6_Chevron-right-black.svg)](https://www.embercopilot.ai/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66eeff4baa6a1f66f357144c/679951b19e5bbde3d22a9ad9_Suggested%20ICD-10%20CPT%20Coding.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66eeff4baa6a1f66f357144c/679952b3dd39cae2d75b7653_athenahealth%20EHR%20Sync.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66eeff4baa6a1f66f357144c/67a24caeac439909bf822670_ICD-10%20Autonomous%20Coding.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66eeff4baa6a1f66f357144c/67a25009e2ecf9fa070e8ed4_Screenshot%202025-02-04%20at%209.31.03%E2%80%AFAM.png)
[Schedule a demo](https://www.embercopilot.ai/</schedule-meeting>)
## A secure partner you can trust
HIPAA and SOC 2 Compliance
Our AI platform is 100% HIPAA and SOC 2 compliant, ensuring your organization meets regulatory requirements and safeguards patient data.
Never Train on Your Data
We never use your data to train our models. Rest assured, your data remains fully under your control, ensuring complete privacy and security.
**Data Security**
Our platform uses secure, U.S.-based cloud infrastructure with the highest levels of security and uptime to protect your data from breaches or loss.
Data Encryption
All data is protected with industry-leading 256-bit encryption, both in transit and at rest, to protect confidentiality and privacy.
Admin Dashboards
Gain insights into system usage. Leverage these reports to improve decision-making and optimize workflows.
Custom Controls
Customize role-based access and compliance settings to fit your unique organizational requirements.
Built for modern healthcare, Ember Copilot simplifies the management of security, compliance, and clinical operations, with advanced tools that ensure data protection and smooth deployments.
[Learn more](https://www.embercopilot.ai/</schedule-meeting>)
## Works with EHRs & Telehealth
![Cerner EHR](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66eeff4baa6a1f66f357144c/66efac2301e1c76f0303599a_cerner.avif)
![Epic EHR](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66eeff4baa6a1f66f357144c/66efabe65d7aed0f390aad00_epic.avif)

And many more
[Learn more](https://www.embercopilot.ai/</schedule-meeting>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62434fa732124a0fb112aab4/62434fa732124a91e612aae8_quote-mark.svg)
## This is the Smart Coding Everyone Needs to Level Up Your Practice
Ember has had a significant impact on my coding and workflow. I used to be conservative with my coding, sticking mostly to level threes. But now, Ember provides the documentation support I need to confidently bill for level fours when appropriate. It even helps me identify missing parameters or timeframes that strengthen my notes. The improvement in accuracy and efficiency has been incredible. It's freed me from the tedious aspects of pre-charting and ensures my work is thorough and compliant. Ember’s ability to streamline my day and elevate my practice is unmatched.
[![Dr. Richard C. Emergency Medicine Physician](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66eeff4baa6a1f66f357144c/67929d629b63eb36194c5b68_Daniel-Rengstorff-GI.jpg)Daniel Rengstorff, MDGastroenterology, Internal Medicine](https://www.embercopilot.ai/<https:/youtu.be/kN5ZoF9uvcQ?si=bUZ6IheqPtudGMiF>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62434fa732124a0fb112aab4/62434fa732124a91e612aae8_quote-mark.svg)
## The Accurate Coding Makes Documentation a Breeze
As a physician, documentation has always been a necessary but time-consuming part of my day. Since incorporating Ember Copilot into my workflow, everything has changed. The HIPAA-compliant, AI-driven service not only generates comprehensive and robust notes after each patient encounter but also ensures precise and accurate coding. This has drastically improved our billing and reimbursement processes. Documentation now feels effortless and efficient, allowing me to focus more on what truly matters—spending quality time with my patients. Best of all, I still get to go home on time. Ember Copilot has revolutionized my practice, and I couldn’t be more grateful.
[![Dr. Richard C. Emergency Medicine Physician](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66eeff4baa6a1f66f357144c/67875c6be2137753fef3664c_payman.jpg)Payman Arabzadeh, MD MBAMedical Director, Davam Urgent Care](https://www.embercopilot.ai/<https:/youtu.be/kN5ZoF9uvcQ?si=bUZ6IheqPtudGMiF>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62434fa732124a0fb112aab4/62434fa732124a91e612aae8_quote-mark.svg)
## Ember Understands the Reality of Modern Practice
I. Hate. Charting. The redundancy of tasks and endless clicks is such a headache, no matter what EHR system I’ve used. Anyone who deals with modern EHRs knows how impossible it feels to stay on top of documentation without sacrificing personal time or seeing fewer patients. Ember changes that completely. It allows me to finish almost all of my charting while I’m still in the room with the patient. I can now devote around 80% of my visit to actual patient care, not documenting. It’s been a game-changer for my workflow. Highly, highly recommend!
[![Dr. Richard C. Emergency Medicine Physician](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66eeff4baa6a1f66f357144c/6712d288d32a3f9109258ee6_DrPatrickBeeman.jpg)Dr. Patrick C. BeemanAddiction Medicine and Ob/Gyn Physician](https://www.embercopilot.ai/<https:/youtu.be/kN5ZoF9uvcQ?si=bUZ6IheqPtudGMiF>)
![Ember Copilot AI Medical Scribe](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62434fa732124a0fb112aab4/62434fa732124a91e612aae8_quote-mark.svg)
## Finally, a Solution That Works the Way I Need
It gives me more time to just focus on my patient, look them in the eye, rather than constantly glancing at a computer and typing as they speak. And the notes that Ember generates are well-organized and comprehensive, capturing all the details of our discussion—even numbers and specialized terms are spot on. It follows the format of our medical records perfectly, and the assessments are just what we need from a professional perspective.
![Prof. Tzung Dau Wang, Cardiologist loves Ember Copilot](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66eeff4baa6a1f66f357144c/66fcdfdf1cf4be73e700e8cd_dr-tzung-dau-wang.png)
Prof. Tzung-Dau Wang
Cardiologist & Ambulatory Service Director
![Ember Copilot AI Medical Scribe](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62434fa732124a0fb112aab4/62434fa732124a91e612aae8_quote-mark.svg)
## Ember made me fall in love with doing therapy again. 
I was a bit stressed about trying to comply with all the things that insurance wants us to do in terms of paperwork. But from day one, session one, I felt like, “Oh my gosh, I love what I do again.” I can just be with the client and focus on them, not worrying about remembering every little detail to include in the note. It’s taken all that pressure off.
[![Dr. Adwoa Akhu loves Ember Copilot](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66eeff4baa6a1f66f357144c/66ef5796aaa052b4480a8ccd_drakhu.jpeg)Dr. Adwoa AkhuClinical Psychologist](https://www.embercopilot.ai/<https:/youtu.be/kN5ZoF9uvcQ?si=bUZ6IheqPtudGMiF>)

Anyone who deals with modern EHRs knows how impossible it feels to stay on top of documentation without sacrificing personal time or seeing fewer patients. Ember changes that completely. It allows me to finish almost all of my charting while I’m still in the room with the patient. I can now devote around 80% of my visit to actual patient care, not documenting. It’s been a game-changer for my workflow. Highly, highly recommend!
![Dr. Richard C. Emergency Medicine Physician⟨39⟩Dr. Patrick C. BeemanAddiction Medicine and Ob/Gyn Physician](https://www.embercopilot.ai/<https:/youtu.be/kN5ZoF9uvcQ?si=bUZ6IheqPtudGMiF>)
![Ember Copilot AI Medical Scribe⟨40⟩]
## Finally, a Solution That Works the Way I Need
It gives me more time to just focus on my patient, look them in the eye, rather than constantly glancing at a computer and typing as they speak. And the notes that Ember generates are well-organized and comprehensive, capturing all the details of our discussion—even numbers and specialized terms are spot on. It follows the format of our medical records perfectly, and the assessments are just what we need from a professional perspective.
![Prof. Tzung Dau Wang, Cardiologist loves Ember Copilot⟨41⟩]
Prof. Tzung-Dau Wang
Cardiologist & Ambulatory Service Director
![Ember Copilot AI Medical Scribe⟨40⟩]
## Ember made me fall in love with doing therapy again. 
I was a bit stressed about trying to comply with all the things that insurance wants us to do in terms of paperwork. But from day one, session one, I felt like, “Oh my gosh, I love what I do again.” I can just be with the client and focus on them, not worrying about remembering every little detail to include in the note. It’s taken all that pressure off.
![Dr. Adwoa Akhu loves Ember Copilot⟨42⟩Dr. Adwoa AkhuClinical Psychologist](https://www.embercopilot.ai/<https:/youtu.be/kN5ZoF9uvcQ?si=bUZ6IheqPtudGMiF>)

generated_description:
**Ember Copilot: Transforming Healthcare Documentation**

Founded in 2024 and emerging from the Y Combinator Batch F24, Ember Copilot is shaking up the healthcare documentation landscape with a laser focus on reducing inefficiencies in clinical documentation and revenue cycle management. Located in San Francisco, this nimble startup operates with a lean team of just two employees but boasts a mission that stands out: they claim to be the only medical scribe capable of reducing claim denials by an impressive 55%. 

### The Problem at Hand
Healthcare practices are losing billions every year due to incomplete documentation, missed billing opportunities, and denied claims—all symptoms of outdated systems that often force clinicians into a painful tug-of-war between patient care and necessary paperwork. Ember Copilot tackles this head-on by leveraging ambient listening technology alongside a deep understanding of medical billing requirements. Their goal? To alleviate the administrative burden healthcare providers face so they can focus on what really matters: patient care.

### Services Offered
Ember Copilot shines in several key areas:
- **Scribing:** Captures comprehensive medical notes in real-time, allowing clinicians to engage more fully with their patients.
- **Coding:** Employs accurate coding practices (boasting a 98% accuracy rate) to expedite reimbursements and minimize claim denials.
- **EHR Integration:** Seamlessly integrates with existing Electronic Health Record (EHR) systems, making the implementation process smoother for healthcare providers.
- **Revenue Cycle Management:** Offers automated solutions to optimize financial performance and streamline revenue cycles.

### Security and Compliance
In today’s healthcare environment, data security is paramount, and Ember Copilot doesn’t fall short. Their platform is fully HIPAA-compliant and adheres to SOC 2 standards, ensuring that patient data is protected and confidential. Notably, they emphasize that they do not use client data to train their models, giving organizations complete control over their information.

### A Little About Their Team
While the Ember Copilot team is small, they’re backed by notable names in the healthcare and technology sectors, and their group partner, Garry Tan, is a respected figure in the startup landscape. This connection to Y Combinator showcases Ember's potential and commitment to innovation.

### Let’s Usher in the Future
Ember Copilot is not just another tech solution; it's a sophisticated tool that medical professionals swear by. Testimonials from doctors highlight significant improvements in efficiency, allowing them to shift their focus back to patient care without the constant anxiety of juggling extensive documentation.

In summary, Ember Copilot emerges as a revolutionary partner for medical practices looking to enhance their documentation processes, reduce claim denials, and ultimately improve patient outcomes—all while navigating the complexities of the modern healthcare landscape. If you’re in the healthcare field and seeking to streamline your operations, Ember Copilot might just be the trusted ally you didn’t know you needed. 

For more information, check out their website: [Ember Copilot](https://www.embercopilot.ai)
